name: Middle Littleton Tithe Barn Walk, Middle Littleton

ai.summary: A 12.7 km moderate hike around the ridges near Middle Littleton, featuring farmland, hedgerows and the historic Tithe Barn. The route offers steady elevation, scenic viewpoints and a varied countryside experience suitable for walkers with some ridge exposure.
ai.terrain_summary: Rural field paths, grassy ridge sections, occasional stony tracks, gates and stiles, with patches of woodland and open farmland. Expect uneven surfaces and potential mud in wetter conditions.
ai.safety_notes: Check the forecast and local conditions before setting out. The ridges can be exposed to wind and sudden weather changes. Wear sturdy boots and layered clothing, bring a map and compass (or a reliable GPS), and carry enough water and snacks. Be mindful of gates and livestock, and note that mobile reception can be limited in remote sections. Let someone know your planned route and expected return time.
recommended_gear: Map and compass or GPS device
Headlamp or flashlight (in case of delays)
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn (roughly March–October) for the best ground conditions and visibility; winter hikes are possible with proper gear and caution.

seo.title: Middle Littleton Tithe Barn Walk — 12.7 km Moderate Ridge Walk in the UK
seo.meta_description: Discover the 12.7 km Middle Littleton Tithe Barn Walk in the UK. A moderate ridge route around Middle Littleton with farmland scenery and views of the historic Tithe Barn.
